trans-unit.source: The MsmqIntegrationBinding class maps Microsoft Message Queuing (MSMQ) messages to [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] messages.
trans-unit.target: A classe de MsmqIntegrationBinding mapeia as mensagens de colocação de mensagens da Microsoft (MSMQ) para [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] mensagens.

trans-unit.source: This binding can be used to enable [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] applications to send and receive messages to and from existing MSMQ applications that use COM, native C++ APIs or the types defined in the <xref:System.Messaging> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Este enlace pode ser utilizado para ativar [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] aplicações enviar e receber mensagens de e para as aplicações MSMQ existentes que utilizam COM, APIs C++ nativas ou tipos definidos na <xref:System.Messaging>espaço de nomes.</xref:System.Messaging>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding"></xref> class by using the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding"> </xref> classe utilizando especificado <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to instantiate a new instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> and pass in a security mode.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite-lhe instanciar uma nova instância do <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding>e passar no modo de segurança.</xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding>

trans-unit.source: The security mode supported by the Message Queuing (MSMQ) integration channel
trans-unit.target: O modo de segurança suportado pelo canal de integração de colocação de mensagens (MSMQ)

trans-unit.source: The value is not within the range of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: O valor não está dentro do intervalo de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding"></xref> class from the settings of a specified configuration binding element.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding"> </xref> classe das definições de um elemento de enlace de configuração especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to place the binding settings in a configuration file but add the actual binding in code.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite-lhe colocar as definições de enlace num ficheiro de configuração, mas adicionar o enlace real no código.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_configurationName" name="configurationName" href=""></xref> attribute that identifies the <xref uid="langword_csharp_binding" name="binding" href=""></xref> element whose settings are used to initialize the binding.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref uid="langword_csharp_configurationName" name="configurationName" href=""> </xref> atributo que identifica o <xref uid="langword_csharp_binding" name="binding" href=""> </xref> elemento cujas definições são utilizadas para inicializar o enlace.

trans-unit.source: Returns the binding elements in the basic profile stack.
trans-unit.target: Devolve os elementos de enlace na pilha de perfil básicas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection> that contains the stack of binding elements in the basic profile stack.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection>que contém a pilha de elementos de enlace na pilha de perfil básicas.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity"></xref> that is associated with this binding.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity"> </xref> que está associado este enlace.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity> encapsulates Message Queuing (MSMQ) transport security settings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity>contém definições de segurança de transporte de colocação de mensagens (MSMQ).</xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity"></xref> that is associated with this binding.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity"> </xref> que está associado este enlace.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the serialization format to be used to serialize or deserialize the message.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o formato de serialização para ser utilizado para serializar ou anular a serialização da mensagem.

trans-unit.source: This property returns an enumeration value that specifies how a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] message will be serialized and deserialized.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve um valor de enumeração que especifica como uma [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] será serializar e anular a serialização da mensagem.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat"></xref> object that represents the type of serialization to use.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat"> </xref> objeto que representa o tipo de serialização para utilizar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether security information should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que especifica se as informações de segurança devem ser serializadas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if security information should be serialized; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as informações de segurança devem ser serializadas; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
